author: Special Correspondent
text:
All- India Mahila Congress president Shobha Oza decried the promotion accorded to TERI vice-chairman R.K. Pachauri despite grave allegations of sexual misconduct against him.

“It is really unfortu-nate that Pachauri is facing harassment charges by a co-worker. And, he is promoted despite the fact that the entire matter is sub judice, and on the same issue he resigned from the International UN IPCC,” she said.
title: Congress cell slams promotion
